subject: RE: [junit] ClassPathTestCollector (solved)
msgSnippet: Hi all, Thanks very much to everyone who offered suggestions and/or code.  For those interested, I ended up using the TEstFinderSuite located in the junit
messageBody:
Hi all,

Thanks very much to everyone who offered suggestions and/or code. For
those interested, I ended up using the TEstFinderSuite located in the junit
project on SourceForge. It was very easy to plug it into my app. Thanks
again.

- Matt Munz
